token.description: A hexadecimal representation of the S2CellId. Tokens must be lower-case (except X), must not contain whitespace, must have trailing zeros stripped. The 0 S2CellId must be represented as 'X'.

minimumHeight.description: The minimum height of the tile, specified in meters above (or below) the WGS84 ellipsoid.

maximumHeight.description: The maximum height of the tile, specified in meters above the WGS84 ellipsoid.
